channel.title: [Runeworld317] i need help bad
channel.description:
ok when i click my run.bat this comes up
Error loading: C:\Program Files\Javajre6\bin\msvcr71.dll Starting System. . . Enforcing client requirement. Settings Loaded Successfully! Online. Handlers Finished Loading
and when i compile this happends
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac (options) (source files) use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue. . .
Compile Code
@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Run.bat Code
@echo off cd Bin java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
I can host it like my friends can join its just its annoying with the error message and i cant compile so i cant update anything.

item.title: [Runeworld317] i need help bad
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Must be a corrupted/missing file. Just re-install Java/JDK etc…I don’t see the problem though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Runeworld317] i need help bad
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

ok when i click my run.bat this comes up

Error loading: C:\Program Files\Javajre6\bin\msvcr71.dll
Starting System. . .
Enforcing client requirement.
Settings Loaded Successfully!
Online.
Handlers Finished Loading

and when i compile this happends

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac (options) (source files)
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue. . .

Compile Code

@echo off
title Compile
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Run.bat Code

@echo off
cd Bin
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

I can host it like my friends can join its just its annoying with the error message and i cant compile so i cant update anything.
